Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
class stGHTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >

This class template implements a GH Tree. The GH Tree has the same external interface and behavior of a Metric Tree.

It can perform both range and k-nearest neighbout queries but without the prunning power of other structures, being linear on the wrost case. Althrough it has a weak prunning power, this tree can be used for comparison with others structures.

This class was developed to generate perfect answers to queries. It allows the build of automated test programs for other metric trees implemented by this library.

Author
Ives Renê Venturini Pola (ives@.nosp@m.icmc.nosp@m..usp..nosp@m.br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)
Todo:
Finish the implementation (some queries).
Version
1.0
